description: Provides confirmation page when users choose to save their application progress and return later

businessContext.purpose: Allow users to safely exit the application process while preserving their progress and receive guidance on how to return
requirements: Offer navigation options back to task list

journeySteps.name: Display Save Confirmation
journeySteps.purpose: Show confirmation that application progress has been saved
validations: Valid application must exist in session
outcomes: Confirmation page displayed with return guidance

errorHandling.trigger: User accesses save page without valid application
errorHandling.handling: Actions framework redirects to start registration
errorHandling.userExperience: Automatic redirect to begin new application

securityConsiderations: Session validation ensures only valid users can access save page
No sensitive data exposed in confirmation page
Clear communication of data retention and session security

performanceCharacteristics.responseTime: Very fast - simple template rendering with minimal processing
performanceCharacteristics.caching: Static template can be cached effectively
performanceCharacteristics.scalability: Highly scalable due to minimal server-side processing
